value.title: API design: Understanding gRPC, OpenAPI and REST and when to use them
value.excerpt: As most software developers no doubt know, there are two primary models for API design: RPC and REST. Regardless of model, most modern APIs are implemented by mapping them in one way or another to the same HTTP protocol.
